CustomField.defaultValue: 'By completing this form, you will be creating a baseline training plan. Nokia EDU Learning leads will use this as a basis of establishing a full training plan.'& BR() &'You may use this form to define a full plan your entire team. At a minimum, it should correspond with the certifications that are required to meet the accreditation you would like achieve this plan year.'& BR() &'How to complete:'& BR() &'1) We recommend you start by reviewing the Certifications Required for Accreditation. It can be found under the Support Assets section of the linked page. '& BR() & '2) Select the product line for which you plan to be accredited. Please provide the approximate number of employees who will be trained, by job role and by quarter (Q1, Q2, ...) '& BR() & '3) If you plan to accredit in multiple technologies or product lines (IP Routing, Passive Optical LAN...), please complete this form for each accreditation.'
CustomField.label: Introduction
